divs: Sighting DetailsMe and three friends were getting into a vehicle. As we were getting in I looked up and this bright halogen light descended from a high altitude down to 2000ft to 3000 ft at a southerly steep angle and then shot from south to north at a high rate of speed way faster than any military jet I had seen.My one friend seen it drop like I did , my two other friends only caught a glimpse of it. We were just like "wow that was kool" and then we didn't give it much thought after that and continued with our business. The next day I call a girlfriend who lived 30 miles to the north. She said she was outside smoking a cigarette when the light shot over her house towards the north. I then told we had seen it too and that I actually saw it drop from the sky and change course.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Port Orange
There were no other sightings in Port Orange on or around June 16th 2002
